name: libredesk
description: LibreDesk is a ticketing system that helps manage customer interactions, support issues, and service requests. Completely self-hosted, it features a clean dashboard, email integration, and user management tools.

features.title: Ticket Management
features.description: Support tickets, Issue tracking, Status workflows. Manage customer support efficiently

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Ticket creation from email, Email notifications, Unified inbox. Handle support via email seamlessly

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Customer accounts, Agent roles, Permission control. Organize your support team

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Ticket overview, Performance metrics, Activity tracking. Monitor support operations at a glance
